Sheet1.EN_GB: Are you sure you want to quit the current level and return to the main menu? All progress of this level will NOT be saved.
Sheet1.ZH_CN: 你确定要退出当前关卡，返回主菜单吗？ 当前关卡的所有进度都不会被保存。

Sheet1.EN_GB: Have a walk along the busiest street in Johor - The Jalan Wong Ah Fook in Johor Bahru. Enjoy the city view, and start the first step of reporting illegal behaviours!
Sheet1.ZH_CN: 沿着柔佛州最热闹的街道——新山市的黄亚福街漫步。享受城市美景，并开始举报非法行为的第一步！

Sheet1.EN_GB: Have you been to the ancient tropical rainforest of Endau-Rompin Johor National Park? Away from the crowdness, take a deep breath, and… Wait, what are those guys doing?
Sheet1.ZH_CN: 你去过柔佛州兴楼云冰国家公园中的古老热带雨林吗？远离喧嚣，深呼吸，然后……等等，那些人在做什么？

Sheet1.EN_GB: The breeze from the harbor are always refreshing, and this is especially true for Puteri Harbour in Nsajaya, but it seems that some people are trying to stain it in the corners.
Sheet1.ZH_CN: 海港的微风总是能使人心旷神怡，位于努沙再也的公主港更是如此，但似乎有人试图在角落将它染上污渍。

Sheet1.EN_GB: As a small town in Johor, Kota Masai is quiet and peaceful with lots of trees covering the sky, while some people are trying to use them to cover crimes.
Sheet1.ZH_CN: 作为位于柔佛州的一个小镇，宁静祥和的马赛城被郁郁葱葱的树木遮盖了天空，而有人在试图用它们遮盖罪行。

Sheet1.EN_GB: Calm down at Batu Pahat, our final stop, enjoy the beauty of nature, and protect it.
Sheet1.ZH_CN: 在我们旅途的终点峇株巴辖静下心，享受自然之美，并守护它。

Sheet1.EN_GB: Management, planning, protection and development of the Permanent Reserved Forests.
Sheet1.ZH_CN: 对于永久保留林的管理、规划、保护和发展。

Sheet1.EN_GB: To manage the national fishery resources, and be the leader in the transformation of a sustainable and competitive fishery.
Sheet1.ZH_CN: 管理国家渔业资源，成为可持续和有竞争力的渔业转型的领导者。
“更安全的船，更安全的港口，更干净的海洋。”

Sheet1.EN_GB: Department of Wildlife and National Parks
Sheet1.ZH_CN: 野生动物保护与国家公园局

Sheet1.EN_GB: To strengthen wildlife conservation programmes through management, enforcement, enrichment and research of wildlife.
Sheet1.ZH_CN: 通过管理、执法、改善和研究野生动物，加强野生动物保护计划。
